official-title.#text:
Prohibiting the use of the Members’ Representational Allowance for the payment of the costs of
			 first-class airline accommodations.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

header.#text: Prohibiting use of Members’ Representational Allowance for first-class airline accommodations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall promulgate revisions to the regulations governing the
			 use of the Members’ Representational Allowance to ensure that the
			 Allowance is not used for the payment of the costs of first-class airline
			 accommodations for domestic travel except as provided under

header.#text: Revision of Regulations Governing the Use of the MRA

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, a
			 Members’ Representational Allowance may be used for the payment of the
			 costs of first-class airline accommodations for domestic travel if the
			 Member whose Allowance will be used for such payment certifies in writing
			 to the
that any of the following applies:

text.#text: Under the revisions promulgated by the

The use of first-class accommodations is necessary to accommodate a medical disability or other
			 special need, as demonstrated by such documentation as the

No accommodations other than first-class accommodations are reasonably available given the timing
			 of the travel, but only if the travel is urgent and the purpose of the
			 travel may not be carried out on alternative dates.

The use of first-class accommodations is necessary because of exceptional security circumstances or
			 other exceptional circumstances.

The use of first-class accommodations will result in an overall cost savings by avoiding additional
			 subsistence costs, overtime, or lost productive time while awaiting
			 coach-class accommodations.
The length of the flight is 5 hours or greater.

quote.#tail: means travel within the continental United States.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 558 IH: Prohibiting the use of the Members’ Representational Allowance for the payment of the costs of first-class airline accommodations.
